Text.Page: I'm surprised that you've come all the way here! We don't get a lot of visitors this deep in the swamp.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Who are you again?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Haha! Don't be shy my friend.

You've clearly come to take instruction from Graidrem, the master angler.

Empty-handed though... and I always instruct better on a full stomach
A true Angler knows how to prepare their catch, so bring me a Fish Steak so we can begin.
Graidrem summoned <PCNAME> for a true test of skill.

Delicious! Crispy on the outside, and juicy inside!

I have to say I'm surprised. Most potential students never return."Okay..."

Now, let's get down to fishing!

I'm going to teach you hor to fish without any bait at all!

Hmm, usually I can smell a properly prepared Fish Steak.
You can buy the ingredients you need from the Fishing Supplies merchant, if you haven't already.

If you want to catch a truly unique fish, you'll need a very special lure. Go into the Hungry Caverns and look for a special skeleton of White Bones in the Cavern of Shackles. You'll know it when you see it.

Gather some Broken Bone Lures from it–three pieces should do–and I'll show you how to catch a Sludge Fish.

Excellent gathering work. You've mastered one of the essential skills of a true angler!

Now fish with those lures here in the Vexatus Swamp Fishery, and you'll catch some Sludge Fish before you know it.
Three lures, three fish. A fine lesson to learn. but if you fail, head back into the Hungry Caverns to get more lures–I'm not running a charity here!
Where are your Broken Bone Lures? Go to the Hungry Caverns and search for the White Bones.
Well done! Sludge Fish are completley inedible, of course, but the true angler lives for the seconds after a crafty fish takes the hook!
My Sludge Fish sense is not tingling. Head back to the Hungry Caverns and get more Broken Bone Lures if you've run out.
